website_summaries.verdict: The excellent Vizio SB36512-F6 brings Dolby Atmos effects to a compact sound bar with rear speakers and a sub -- all for a very affordable price.
pros: The Vizio SB36512-F6 is one of the least expensive ways to get Dolby Atmos
Sound quality is excellent for the price
The compact design includes dedicated rear speakers, and the number of inputs exceeds many competitors with Bluetooth, HDMI in/out and Chromecast Wi-Fi music
cons: The sound bar lacks DTS:X decoding, its performance with music isn't spectacular, and the dotted input display can be confusing

customer_reviews.title: Hitting pause or stop causes malfunction. Avoid!!!
customer_reviews.text: Massive issues with arc sound not working. If you turn off a 4k UHD streaming video or hit pause, the soundbar defaults to tv speakers which you probably muted during setup. In short you will have no sound. AVOID THIS SOUNDBAR AT ANY COST. MAJOR HEADACHES. I returned mine.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lieder

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound
customer_reviews.text: Had a pretty hard time installing but a call to Vizio eventually fixed it. Every part of the actual sound quality is amazing. I can adjust the surround sound, subwoofer, and center speaker separately from each other. The soundbar is loud and clear. The subwoofer is bassy and the surround sound works amazing (particularly cool with horror movies). I wish the screen on the remote had a backlight-it’s really hard to see. Also having a small screen on the actual soundbar would be nice. The lights are impossible to interpret without the manual.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Movie theater sound, at home!
customer_reviews.text: Setup yesterday and paired with a 75 inch Samsung. The sound is pretty amazing. Plenty loud and the surround effect is excellent. Huge step up over the built-in TV speakers. We watched a 3D Blu-ray (X-men Apocalypse) and had the volume fairly loud and the experience reminded me of the movie theater. Loud, crisp sound, booming bass, and full surround. Probably isn’t audiophile quality sound, and I wouldn’t expect it to be for the price, but it is very enjoyable, and the Dolby Atmos adds a little bit of height in sound in front of you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control seems to be an issue with their soundbars.
customer_reviews.text: Third Vizio soundbar I have purchased. First 5.1 is still going strong after 5 years along with one of their LED television sets. Second one died after 6 months- soundbar would not power up. This one looked like a good value, had really good reviews, and would fit into the same space as the one that stopped working. However this one was dead on arrival. It powers up but would not produce any sounds. Did a factory reset several times but still no sound via the speaker test, via Bluetooth, optical, or HDMI. Called Vizio who offered to send a replacement, but given recent track record with their products, I declined and am sending the unit back.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce D. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: STOP WORKING AFTER 3 HRS OF PLAY
customer_reviews.text: Got this sound bar for my media room, I was looking forward to installing it, but could not do so for about 3 weeks--VERY BUSY. Finally installed it, work great for about 3 hours. Now it simply will not take any kind of inputs-NONE, NADA, NUNCA, ZILTCH NOTHING. Just stopped working! Now I've got to find time to send this $400 paper weight back to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: A. T. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy it again
customer_reviews.text: If you're shopping for a soundbar, don't bother considering any that do not include or allow for the addition of rear speakers. This setup is great. Action movies are excellent, sports are immersive, Bluetooth music is powerful. No trouble yet with the wireless sub/speakers cutting out. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JShostak

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working. Support couldn’t help. Useless product and useless customer support. Take your money elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Cc2012

customer_reviews.title: Best Soundbar Ever
customer_reviews.text: Lot's of great reviews already written, so I will just say that I have tried many soundbars. I have also had some pretty elaborate A/V component systems over the years as well. Overall, this is the best sound source, especially for movies, that I have ever had in my home. No complaints, other than the remote should have a back-light on it to make reading it easier. That having been said, being able to use my smart phone as a remote more than makes up for that.
customer_reviews.author: BatBoy65

customer_reviews.title: Great system when it works.
customer_reviews.text: I have now been through 2 of these sound bars. The sound quality was great when they did work but both of them died quickly. The first bar all of the inputs stopped working with in my return window so I returned it and got another back in March. The second one will not power on at all today (August). The good news for me is that after contacting customer support they offered to send me a replacement. Lets hope 3rd time really is the charm.
customer_reviews.author: Nich

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this! You will be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: The hardware used to make this device is the worst. Also customer support is atrocious. I bought this a while ago and immediately had problems. I tried doing a firmware update and it now tries to update itself every other day. Also the main HDMI input consistently fails. Just failure after failure. Do not waste your money please! This may seem like a great solution but it is not functional. A great deal on trash is still trash.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Silva

customer_reviews.title: Price is great
customer_reviews.text: Good looking speakers although not sure about sound quality; at times get a strange bass amplification. Made a mistake of going for factory reset which cause a complete reinstall which the system couldn't connect to. Had to reinstall second time for it to find a link to my TV. The remote is almost useless, yet it works much better when used with my android phone with the downloadable SmartCast. Won't bother changing for a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory L. Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Can be temperamental to re-connect
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, solid construction. Not always easy to get the connection I need with my Samsung TV via HDMI ARC but that may be the TV! Can be a problem when switching back to the sound bar from BT headphones. Restarting the TV fixes the problem. Full sound and flawless BT transmission to the subwoofer. Plenty of wires supplied to connect rear channels that include good plugs. Remote is too tiny and difficult to see the display. Not an issue if using HDMI ARC
customer_reviews.author: Howard Farr

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Sound cracks almost constantly. Soundbar will not connect to Google Mesh no matter what I do. Remote is antiquated, as is the app. Total nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: Equatorialthoughts

customer_reviews.title: Worth moneybut  bit hassle
customer_reviews.text: After a year finally i put out revirw for this product, there is bugs or glitch when i unplug the power, it will reset to reinstall the software again and yeah it is annoying, but the sounds and the prices is make it really worth it to buy
customer_reviews.author: Timble Great

customer_reviews.title: Sounds very good to me.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a black Friday deal so my price was better than normal. It sounds really good to me. It is like being in a theater. The only thing that I hope there is a setting for is that there is a delay that causes voices not to be perfectly synced with the person speaking. It might be a Bluetooth thing, I don’t know. But yes I recommend this sound bar.
customer_reviews.author: Steven C. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: 50% of the time, it works all the time.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good for the price. Randomly stops working and communicating with app. In retrospect I should have spent $300-$500 more for a more reliable system. It literally has a mind of its own.
customer_reviews.author: Alex & Matt

customer_reviews.title: Really good sound in a small package
customer_reviews.text: I used to have an amplifier hooked up to my television and used nice speakers. This setup sounds just as good as that using tiny speakers a soundbar and a subwoofer. You can plug your phone straight into the soundbar to play your music. It sounds a heck a lot better than it looks like it would.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressive value
customer_reviews.text: Surprising sound for the money. Great value. The remote is really annoying due to no backlight in the display, so in a dark room you have to use your phone's flashlight to see it. Our couch is in the middle of a big room so mounting the surround speakers on stands was necessary - trying them on the floor just failed. Even our audio snob son was impressed - haha!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awsome sound!!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound on this soundbar system!! I tried the yamaha soundbar that was about $199 but it didnt have a separate subwoofer and lacked that extra thump in bass. This vizio has just what I wanted. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Bulkier than it looks and I use it with my PC.
customer_reviews.text: First my experience isn't typical since I use it with my PC. It is a bit tricky to connect it with your pc. One of the rear speakers wasn't working but the seller sent me a replacement very quickly. Remember, to use Atmos, you have to use HDMI.
customer_reviews.author: Bevo warrior

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: By far a great bang for the buck. Purchased a Pioneer model was not happy and purchased this. I was under the impression Visio was a discount brand but read the great reviews and agree a perfect addition to our 4K tv. Please be aware the sub is wireless but the rear surround sound speakers which connect to the sub are NOT. Sounds great overall you will NOT be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use.
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up , sound is very good, bluetooth and sub woofer. What else could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Brahler

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality for price!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best surround systems you can buy under $500. Great sound quality and best price. Had a few trouble when connected to my Vizio TV but it was an easy fix! Great product for the value!
customer_reviews.author: nivy68

customer_reviews.title: Impressive sound overall.
customer_reviews.text: Not an audiophile but this is my first real system and super impressed with the sound. Havent gotten it about 70% as its freakin loud. Only issues are with connectivity which is a bit clunky. Have it running via google home most of the time. Happy with the purchase and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Feinberg

customer_reviews.title: Powerful speaker for the $, with Atmos, it's a steal.
customer_reviews.text: If you set up the bar properly (do your homework) you get a great, powerful sound. Plus, with the up firing and rear speakers for Atmos this is a steal...It does not work as well in large rooms with high ceilings, which for $300, has to be understood. Also, you need to be aware that you need source material and streaming services that have Atmos to get the effect. Bottomline, even if you're unimpressed with the atmos effect you get an excellent sounding soundbar for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: POS
customer_reviews.text: This has been a hard sound system to keep working. The sound is good when it works but it constantly turns off randomly or doesn't connect when the TV is turned on.
customer_reviews.author: Moodyjo

customer_reviews.title: Really nice, full sound!
customer_reviews.text: The easiest to set up of any soundbar I have ever set up (and I've set up a few!). The Atmos sound is very noticeably better and different than the ordinary Dolby sound profiles. For the price, a very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: HankBear

customer_reviews.title: Connectivity/ Pairing issues with SmartCast App.
customer_reviews.text: Very buggy, have to contact Visio Support. The soundbar isn’t recognizing and pair , after Bluetooth and WiFi instructions. I can’t proceed with the Smart App instructions. I bought a soundbar to use it , Not for it to be a headache. Speaker test is fine the all get signal, but pairing is an issue, and switching input functions doesn’t help.
customer_reviews.author: Simeon Wasonga

customer_reviews.title: Best value and high sound quality
customer_reviews.text: The only ongoing issue I have is not being able to see the remote display at night. The sound quality is up there with systems that cost double.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Rendered useless by passthrough issues
customer_reviews.text: Do you like spending more time dealing with intermittent issues than using your speakers? Do you like it when you spend 6 hours getting your 4k blu rays to play with atmos on your xbox one x, only to have it not work the next day?
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
customer_reviews.text: When it was reviewed as the best soundbar under $600 it was an understatrment. It's unbelievable. The sound is incredible. Took 20 minutes from unboxing to running my TV through it. That includes hanging the rears on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: BWeber

customer_reviews.title: It's all about the bass
customer_reviews.text: The sound is amazing. Truly feel like you are in a theater
customer_reviews.author: Jade Rosas

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound bar
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sound bar. Works well with my VIZIO TV.
customer_reviews.author: DeAnna & Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Theater Sound System
customer_reviews.text: This theater sound system is top of the line. From music, movies, and games, they all sound fantastic especially with Dolby Atmos.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best at this target price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for the price. At this price level, it’s cool to have an Atmos function.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos L Collazo

customer_reviews.title: Always love vizio soundbars
customer_reviews.text: Better then I thought wish I can add another sub woofer
customer_reviews.author: chris williams

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great surround sound system for the price. Much better than the older Vizio surround sound system I replaced.
customer_reviews.author: D-Fi

customer_reviews.title: Soundbar Home Speaker
customer_reviews.text: This speaker systems works great. We are very impressed with the quality of the sound.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Slunaker

customer_reviews.title: Refurb was not operable
customer_reviews.text: This refurbished item did not work directly out of the box. I returned it for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: BruBru

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Only gripe is music isn’t the best but movies sound amazing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup....
customer_reviews.text: Superior surround sound. More than half the size of my old soundbar system. Excellent buy for the money. Set up was super simple.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Atmos sound for the value.
customer_reviews.text: Paired the sound bar with a Vizio Quantum television. This sound bar works best with movies.
customer_reviews.author: stephen m wellman

customer_reviews.title: Voices are finally clear now
customer_reviews.text: This sound bar is just what I was looking for. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

product_meta.title: VIZIO SB36512-F6 5.1 Soundbar Home Speaker (2018)
product_meta.description: Premium sound has entered a new dimension. The VIZIO 36" 5.1.2 Home theater sound system with Dolby Atoms produces sound from all around you even from above. Like premium theaters powered by Dolby Atoms, these immersive experiences let you “go inside the story”. Unique upward firing speakers deliver 8 total channels of crystal clear, truly immersive sound without any complex setup required. Plug and play installation with all the cables included puts cinematic sound in your home within minutes. With two speakers that precisely deflect sound off the ceiling, The VIZIO 36” 5.1.2 Home theater sound system with Dolby Atoms, offers a revolutionary design. You’ll hear Birds, thunderstorms, and helicopters swirl above you for an unparalleled listening experience. Engineered to delight demanding cinephile, each system starts with rich sound from the main bar. Separate center channels create crystal clear spoken dialogue, while powerful subwoofer produces rumbling bass you can feel. The rear surround sound speakers Complete the system and adding the upward firing speakers will wrap your entire viewing environment with sound. Amazing sound like this shouldn’t be limited to movie nights. Just use your smartphone to stream music from any Chromecast enabled audio app, like Spotify, Pandora, iHeartRadio, Google Play music and more. and streaming over Wi Fi means the highest audio quality with no interruptions. Download the free VIZIO Smart cast mobile app and turn your mobile device into a powerful remote. This sound system also works with the Google assistant on devices like Google home, so you can control your sound bar using just your voice. The future of home theater has arrived. VIZIO 36" 5.1.2 Home theater sound system with Dolby Atoms sets a new standard for immersive in home Cinema.
feature_bullets: Premium cinema experience at home: Built in upward firing speakers & true 5.1.2 surround sound with Dolby atoms, delivers a truly immersive audio experience that moves all around you, even from above
Dolby atoms: Transports you from the ordinary into the extraordinary with breathtaking, moving audio that fills your room and flows Above and around you
Cinematic surround sound: Rear surround sound speakers and 2 upward firing speakers create a cinema like audio experience right in your own home
Multi room streaming: Group multiple VIZIO SmartCast audio devices throughout your home and stream your favorite music in multiple rooms
Premium audio cables included: Easy set up using included cables; Enjoy cinematic sound within minutes

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars120 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
